statements: UPDATE financial_data SET revenue = 5000.00, profit = revenue - expenses WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE financial_data SET expenses = 1000.00, revenue = revenue + 2000.00 WHERE company_name = 'XYZ Corp';
UPDATE financial_data SET revenue = 50000.00, expenses = 30000.00, profit = 20000.00 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE financial_data SET expenses = 25000.00, profit = revenue - 25000.00 WHERE company_name = 'ABC Corp';
